entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 10.
